* [[Tom Thayer]] (class of 1979) was an [[NFL]] [[offensive lineman]] for the [[Chicago Bears]], and was a member of the team which won [[Super Bowl XX]]. He is currently a radio color commentator for the Chicago Bears<ref>[http://chicago.cbslocal.com/personality/tom-thayer/ Tom Thayer bio]</ref>
* [[Tom Thayer]] (class of 1979) was an [[NFL]] [[offensive lineman]] for the [[Chicago Bears]], and was a member of the team which won [[Super Bowl XX]]. He is currently a radio color commentator for the Chicago Bears<ref>[http://chicago.cbslocal.com/personality/tom-thayer/ Tom Thayer bio]</ref>
* [[Allie Quigley]] (Class of 2004) Currently plays in the [[WNBA]] as a member of the [[Phoenix Mercury]]. Attended [[DePaul University]] and received honors such as [[Conference USA]] Freshman of the Year as well as two time first team all [[Big East]].
* [[Allie Quigley]] (Class of 2004) Currently plays in the [[WNBA]] as a member of the [[Phoenix Mercury]]. Attended [[DePaul University]] and received honors such as [[Conference USA]] Freshman of the Year as well as two time first team all [[Big East]].
â
* [[Michael Maynard]] (Class of 2007) Resident expert in Fourth Year Accounting studies. Friends with Ian Jones, Kyle Schmitt, and Ron Wong. The four of them would go on to become the C league intramural championships at Bradley University.
